title: Stuffed pork fillet wrapped in pancetta
ingredients: ['25g butter', '1 onion', '175g breadcrumbs', '1 lemon, zest grated only', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 pinch dried parsley', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 egg, beaten', '2 large pork fillets', '12 slices pancetta', 'ball of string', '1 tablespoon oil']
